name: Graveyard Gate
description: This modular graveyard gate has working doors and chains.  The toppers on the pillars are interchangeable so you can turn this into a totally dark and evil entrance,  make it the entrance to your typical graveyard, or even make it an entrance into an estate!  This looks amazing with the graveyard fences that you can also find here on Itch.io.  Watch the video tutorial on YouTube and follow along with the build.
